title: i can make log in
body: why i can make log in with my password

replies.body: I'm guessing you've been having problems getting logged into the client with your usual password? If it's no longer working, it could be a sign that someone else was able to hack your account and change the password without you noticing. I'd reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure your account is kept safe!
